about.title: About
about.intro: Telegram solutions developer: bots on any stack and Mini Apps. I help automate communication, content delivery and interactive flows inside Telegram.
paragraphs: I work with Telegram Bot API and Mini Apps (Web App): from simple notification bots to catalogs, ticketing and integrations with your infrastructure. Stack: Node.js, Python, React, TypeScript; I adapt to project requirements when needed.
Approach: clear time estimates, solid implementation, and optional support after launch. Happy to discuss your task and suggest options that fit your budget and timeline.
If you need to automate customer communication, deliver content, or build an interactive app inside Telegram — get in touch and we can go through the task and implementation options.
highlights: Bots on Node.js, Python or any suitable stack
Mini Apps with React and TypeScript
Integrations with CRM, databases and external APIs
Support and improvements for existing bots

flowShop.title: Flow — E-commerce Store
flowShop.short: Telegram bot for an e-commerce store with price calculation for goods from China, order tracking, loyalty program, and keyboard modding services

hubMiniapp.title: Hub — Telegram Mini App
hubMiniapp.short: Telegram Mini App for manufacturers, distributors and dealers: AI advisor, networking, consultations, events calendar, knowledge base, admin panel.

autoking.title: AUTOKING — Detailing Studio Bot
autoking.short: Telegram bot for booking detailing services: choose service, date and time, catalog with price lists by vehicle class, SMS reminders, integration with Google Calendar and Sheets. Button-based admin panel.

financeManager.title: Finance Manager — MiniApp
financeManager.short: Telegram bot for personal finance with MiniApp: income and expenses, categories, goals, work shifts, category budgets, subscriptions, debts, analytics and calendar. Backend on FastAPI and aiogram, frontend on React and Recharts.
